FAQsHeader: Following are the Frequently Asked Questions about Marlin®
A1: Marlin® is a comprehensive cloud-based platform developed for brokerage firms to manage their Backoffice operations as well as real time trading. Marlin® has enriched trading module which allows brokers and their investors to place orders/trade in exchange. It has both real trading as well as virtual trading.
A2: Access Marlin application over the internet and register yourself by simply signing in.
Q3: How to open a demo account?
A3: Marlin® is the easiest and free way to open a demo trade account. Open your account with just your email address and start virtual trading without having funds.
A4: First you need to Signup on Marlin® and once you successfully login into the option then click on 'Become an Investor' option available on dashboard. Fill in the required information, choose desired broker and submit. Once your information is approved by relevant broker, you’ll be able to do trading as an investor.
Q5: Does Marlin® have price charts and graphs?
A5: Yes! Marlin® has interactive live and historical price and volume charts for all stocks and indices. You can see symbol chart as per various time frequencies for the day, months, YTD, 1 year, 3 year and 5 years etc.
Q6: Is the data available live and real time?
A6: Yes! Marlin® is integrated with exchange system and it shows real-time data.
Q7: Does Marlin® also provide trading related news to investors?
A7: Yes, relevant exchange related news is available under ‘Recent News’ section. On Symbol detail, you can visualize specific news of that particular symbol/security.
Q8: How can I contact Marlin® customer support?
A8: You can contact Marlin® customer support by approaching on “Contact Us” and filling out the form. There is a dedicated support team available 24/7 to respond to your queries.
Q9: Can I do trade and buy real shares with Marlin®?
A9: Yes, by MARLIN® actual trade as an investor you can do real-time trading and buy the real shares.
Q10: What kind of securities can I trade in Marlin®?
A10: Marlin® offers trading in multiple asset classes. You can trade in Equities, Bonds, ETFs, Cryptos, Commodities, Derivatives as configured in an integrated exchange.
Q11: Which Documents are required to become an investor?
A11: Identity document it can be passport, NIC etc.
Q12: How to reset my account password?
A12: Upon login you can click forget password and give your email and your password would be reset. You can also reset your password from profile settings once you’re already logged in.
Q13: Can I use the same account for virtual as well as actual trading?
A13: Yes, you can use the same account just by becoming an investor you can switch to the actual trading as well.
A14: Marlin provides ‘Executed Orders’ report for current day and ‘Transaction History’ report for current day and historical dates as well.
Q15: How to Check Balance and Transfer Funds?
A15: Client Balance Inquiry report provides complete information about cash as well as holding position of an investor.
A16: Yes, MARLIN® is a Multilingual website supporting the English and Portuguese language currently.
Q17: Where can I access portfolio management?
A17: Marlin® has asset class wise portfolio management. Investor can visualize his/her complete portfolio including holding positions among configured asset classes like Equities, Bonds, ETFs etc.
A18: Marlin® offers comprehensive Market Watch for quick & easy tracking of asset class wise securities. Investors can maintain a personalized list of favorite securities. A quick watchlist is also available on header which can be accessed just by clicking + icon.
Q19: How do I that my order has been placed in exchange?
A19: You can verify your order in working orders report and order book of respective security. Quick working orders window are also available on dashboard.
Q20: How many types of reports can I access?
A20: Marlin® has an enrich reports available comprising end to end trading cycle like Working Orders Report, Portfolio Management, Trade History Report, Event Log Report and many more.
faqBottom: If you have a question which is not answered here, reach us out through our
P2: With offices across the world from London to Accra, we are one of the fastest growing information technology groups in the world. Having delivered major multimillion dollar projects in important verticals across the world for over two decades, InfoTech is the go to partner for solutions that enrich companies.
P3: Our solutions are “Brilliantly Built” because they have our customers at the center. Backed by fanatical support, in depth expertise of consultants, and robust communication that permeates all phases of the project, working with the InfoTech group is a partnership that transforms organizations. ISO 9001 and 27001 certifications as well as a CMMI Level 3 software division ensure world class quality of product and solutions.
P4: Having done some of the most complex implementations in some of the largest companies in emerging markets, InfoTech knows how critical the information technology environment is to the core functioning of an enterprise. InfoTech is known by its end users for approaching implementations not as projects but as game changing initiatives that re-invent entire companies.
